categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text:
The Neimoidia system or Neimoidian system was a star system in the Colonies region of the galaxy. It contained the planet of Neimoidia, the Neimoidian homeworld, as well as several other planets:
Deel, a molten rock, Moonan, a toxic wasteland, and Partainu, a gas giant.
Neimoidia system also contained an extremely mineral-rich asteroid belt, Saak Sooin, which the Neimoidian people sold at overwhelming prices.
